scenes.description: Kiryu Coco introduces the 3rd Gen members (Usada Pekora, Uruha Rushia, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine) and asks for their impressions/memories.
Pekora, Marine, and Noel discuss their first impressions of Coco's debut and how touching it was.
Coco mentions that the 3rd Gen were the easiest seniors for the 4th Gen to approach.
Marine tells a suggestive story about staying at Coco's place, involving getting wet and a bruise on her butt.
Noel shares a story about borrowing a tacky old-fashioned light from Coco when she moved near her house.
Rushia talks about how Coco helped her move by sending her property listings.
